name: tm18
effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Counter)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A heavy rain falls for five turns, powering up WATER- type moves.
